Treasure Earring (Emerald, Right Ear, Women)

Treasure Earring (Emerald, Right Ear, Women)
kDesc
This gem is a type of beryl that is tinged with a striking green colour. For the right ear. (Mohs hardness: 8)[#Legal]
Ce bijou est une pierre teintée d'une couleur verte frappante. Pour l'oreille droite. (Échelle de Mohs : 8)[#Legal]
Dieser Edelstein ist eine Art Beryll, der in einem bemerkenswerten Grünton schimmert. Für das rechte Ohr. (Mohssche Härte: 8) [#Legal]
Questa gemma è un tipo di berillio con una sfumatura verde mozzafiato. Orecchio destro. (Durezza in scala Mohs: 8)[#Legal]
Esta gema es un tipo de berilio teñido de un impactante color verde. Para la oreja derecha. (Dureza en la escala de Mohs: 8) [#Legal]
緑柱石の一種で、強い緑色を帯びた宝石。右耳用。（モース硬度８）[#Legal]
녹주석의 일종으로 선명한 녹색을 가진 보석. 오른쪽 귀 전용. (모스 경도8)[#Legal]
This gem is a type of beryl that is tinged with a striking green color. For the right ear. (Mohs hardness: 8)[#Legal]
這是綠柱石的一種，帶有鮮豔的綠色。供右耳用。（摩斯硬度8）[#Legal]
這是綠柱石的一種，帶有鮮豔的綠色。供右耳用。（摩斯硬度8）[#Legal]
This gem is a type of beryl that is tinged with a striking green colour. For the right ear. (Mohs hardness: 8)[#Legal]
